jobs.title: Senior Video Editor - Netflix Original Series
jobs.description: Seeking experienced editor for high-profile streaming series. Must have extensive experience with Avid Media Composer and collaborative post-production workflows.

jobs.title: Director of Photography - Independent Film
jobs.description: Looking for skilled cinematographer to shoot independent feature film. RED camera experience and natural lighting expertise required.

jobs.title: VFX Supervisor - Marvel Studios
jobs.description: VFX Supervisor needed for major superhero film. Strong background in Maya, Nuke, and team management essential.

jobs.title: Sound Designer - A24 Horror Film
jobs.description: Sound designer for atmospheric horror film. Experience with Pro Tools, Foley recording, and sound library management preferred.

jobs.title: Production Designer - HBO Max Series
jobs.description: Production designer for fantasy series set in medieval times. Strong attention to historical detail and large-scale set design required.

jobs.title: Cinematographer - Documentary Film
jobs.description: Cinematographer for environmental documentary. Drone operation license and wildlife filming experience preferred.

jobs.title: Assistant Director - Warner Bros Feature
jobs.description: Assistant director for big-budget action film. Strong organizational skills and high-pressure set experience required.

jobs.title: Makeup Department Head - Disney+ Fantasy
jobs.description: Makeup department head for fantasy series. Prosthetics, special effects makeup, and team leadership experience needed.

jobs.title: Gaffer - Apple TV+ Drama Series
jobs.description: Gaffer for critically acclaimed drama series. LED lighting expertise and color temperature mastery required.

jobs.title: Script Supervisor - Amazon Prime Thriller
jobs.description: Script supervisor for psychological thriller. Continuity experience and meticulous attention to detail essential.

jobs.title: Casting Director - Indie Romance Film
jobs.description: Casting director for romantic comedy film. Strong industry connections and talent evaluation skills required.

jobs.title: Location Manager - Netflix Action Series
jobs.description: Location manager for action series. Scouting experience and permit negotiation skills essential.

jobs.title: Stunt Coordinator - Fast & Furious Franchise
jobs.description: Stunt coordinator for major action franchise. Safety certification and wire work experience required.

jobs.title: Costume Designer - Period Drama Film
jobs.description: Costume designer for 1940s period drama. Historical research skills and fabric knowledge essential.

jobs.title: Boom Operator - Sitcom Production
jobs.description: Boom operator for multi-camera sitcom. Live audience experience and microphone technique expertise required.
